## PureObserverInfo type

Observer Info

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PureObserverInfo = Record<string, PureObserverProp[]>;
```

## Remarks

The key of this map always be component's name, the value of this map is an array of `PureObserverProp`
